jhelp.gui

Class FontChooserCompact

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • jhelp.gui.FontChooserCompact
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.event.ChangeListener

    public class FontChooserCompact
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, javax.swing.event.ChangeListener
    Component for choose a font.
    It's the compact version and don't have a link dialog.
    For having a dialog or have a bigger version see FontChooser

    Last modification : 12 mai 2009
    Version 0.0.0
    Author:
    JHelp
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
